sql.value: CREATE TABLE t_log(id int, status varchar(10))
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS t_log(id int, status varchar(10))
CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE IF NOT EXISTS t_log(id int, status varchar(10))
CREATE GLOBAL TEMPORARY TABLE t_log(id int, status varchar(10))
CREATE LOCAL TEMP TABLE t_log(id int, status varchar(10))
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE t_log(id int, status varchar(10))
